name.ja: 影霊翼騎 ウェンディクルフ

text.en:
1 "Shaddoll" monster + 1 WIND monster
Must first be Fusion Summoned. (Quick Effect): You can change any number of face-down monsters on the field to face-up Defense Position, then you can count the number of Flip monsters among them, and if you do, change up to that many face-up monsters, except face-up Defense Position monsters, to face-down Defense Position. You can only use this effect of "Reeshaddoll Wendicluhu" once per turn. If this card is sent to the GY: You can target 1 "Shaddoll" card in your GY; add it to your hand.
